# Code DatasauRus

## Importación de las librerías

```{r librarys}
library(tidyverse)
library(datasauRus)
```

## Carga del dataset datasaurus
```{r}

```

```{r dataset}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarise(
    mean_x = mean(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    std_dev_x = sd(x),
    std_dev_y = sd(y),
    corr_x_y = cor(x, y)
  )
```

## Gráficas a partir del dataset

```{r grafica}
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_void()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol=3)
```

## Gráfica de la regresión de x_shape

```{r}
df_x <- subset(datasaurus_dozen, dataset == "x_shape")
ggplot(df_x, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point(color = "deeppink", alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black") +
  ggtitle("Regresión lineal de x_shape") +
  theme_minimal()
```
